tool.name: RSmax
tool.command:
#set $tmp_unscored_modstr = str($unscoredmods).replace("___,","___") #set $mzml_list = "" #for $each in $mzml_files: #set $mzml_list+= "\"" ln -s '$each' '${each.display_name}'; #set $mzml_list+=$str($each.display_name) #set $mzml_list+= "\"" #set $mzml_list+= "," #end for #set $mzml_list=mzml_list[:-1]
cwd=`pwd`; tar -zxvf $perco_out; python /nfs/galaxy/galaxy/tools/wohl-proteomics/RSmax/rsmax_wrapper.py /nfs/galaxy/galaxy/tools/wohl-proteomics/RSmax/RSmax.exe --pout output/ --ms2tol $ms2tol --target "STY 79.966331 H3PO4" --nl "ST -97.97690 H3PO4" $scoreneutrallosses --mp $maxnumperm --nt $numthreads --filter $filter --expgroups $exp_file --mzml $mzml_list 2>&1; find . -type f -name '*.mzML' -delete; tar -cvf - output/ 2>/dev/null | pigz -9 -p 24 > $crux_tar_gz 2>&1

param.name: filter
param.label: Percolator q-value threshold
param.help: Given as MAXIMUM percolator q-value (ie all PSMs lower than or equal to this q-value are scored)

param.name: maxnumperm
param.help: Maximum number of permutations per sequence. Default is 16384
param.label: Maximum permutations per sequence
